ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 205
ygData.msgSnippet: This hasn t happened to me, but has many of my guild members.. I think it has to do with zoning while dying tho..
ygData.messageBody:
This hasn't happened to me, but has many of my guild members.. I think it
has to do with zoning while dying tho..


>From: "Garett" <osmosis@...>
>Reply-To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
>To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 205
>Date: Wed, 22 Dec 1999 22:48:23 -0800
>
>yup, one at least... If you are hit while zoning into Lavastorm from
>Solusek
>B there is a chance you will be thrust into the lava in Lavastorm. When
>you
>return to Lavastorm from Nek Forest you will find your corpse sitting near
>the zone there... this only happened to me once but a groupmember said that
>this had happened to him also and wasnt that surprising.
>
>Cogg - Rallos Zek
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Shawn Alley <ShawnA@...>
>To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
>Sent: Wednesday, December 22, 1999 3:14 PM
>Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 205
>
>
> > From: Shawn Alley <ShawnA@...>
> >
> > There are a number of places where being hit at the zone border plops
>you
> > somewhere else in the next zone. Here's some that I know of:
> >
> > Unrest to Dagnar's Cauldron:
> > If you are hit on your way out of Unrest you may fall "below" the world.
> > You will find yourself in the water under the land which goes around the
> > lake. When this happened to my wife I suggested she swim off the edge.
> > Don't do that! She fell for 10,000 points of damage and I had to get my
> > necro to locate her corpse (which was beneath the land near 0,0).
>Without
>a
> > necro we would have never found it. Meanwhile we had petitioned a GM
>and
>he
> > was sad when he finally got to us because my wife had already looted her
> > corpse otherwise he would have res'ed her. When the same thing happened
>to
> > me I knew not to swim of the edge but what to do? I swam to the middle
>and
> > climbed up the island. Once you do this you can swim back to the land
>and
> > climb up.
> >
> > Oasis to No Ro:
> > If you are hit hard enough (sand giant, etc.) on your way out of Unrest
>you
> > may find yourself near the inn but the kicker is you will fall for some
> > small amount of damage. It's not much but if you were almost dead you
>will
> > be dead after you fall. This is a change from a while back where you
>would
> > bounce back into Oasis at full health (which was kind of cool).
> >
> > Beholder Maze to Runneyeye:
> > Had to run from a train that was led into the entrance of Runneyeye.
>Got
> > hit going through apparently and died. My corpse was not on either side
>of
> > the zone. I managed to find it in Runneye in the first alcove to the
>left
> > by the little stream.
> >
> > Anyone know of others?
> > Shawn
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Jenni [mailto:freya@...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, December 21, 1999 12:36 PM
> > To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 205
> >
> >
> > From: Jenni <freya@...>
> >
> > On fighting in Lavastorm:
> >
> > Be very very careful if you are fighting near the entrance to Najena.
>This
> > has
> > happened to me and a friend of mine. After being ambushed by 3 fire
> > elementals
> > while looting my corpse (I just got all my armor, but my bags were on my
> > corpse) I ran to the zone to Najena because there was no way I was
>going
>to
> > live otherwise. Instead of zoning into the hallway where you're
>supposed
>to
> > end
> > up, I ended up in a room full of Magicians and pets and was immediately
> > killed.
> > I had to petition to get my corpse (which took 2 hours). The GM that
>helped
> > me
> > was very nice and pulled my corpse out to safety for me. When this
>happened
> > to
> > a friend of mine the GM's weren't quite so nice. They didn't believe
>that
> > he
> > just zoned in to avoid a monster they believed he was "exploring" in
>Najena
> > (at
> > level 12!). It took him 2 hours of arguing with a GM before he got his
> > corpse
> > back. Both GM's mentioned that this does happen occasionally at that
>zone
> > edge
> > (the second GM said my friend's corpse was on the wrong side of the room
>:(
> > ).
> > I have no idea if or when they plan on fixing it. :(
> >
> > Has this happened to anyone else?
> >
> > Ezrae
> > Still level 14
> > Brell Serilis
> >
> >
> >
> > Paul Jesernig wrote:
> >
> > > From: "Paul Jesernig" <pwj@...>
> > >
> > > Solo hunting? Lavastorm is ok, you can hunt near Najena and zone if
>you
> > have
> > > a problem. Don't know how much gear you have, as you hit the harder
>things
> > > you'll need a magic weapon. Yard trash in Unrest is also very good at
>this
> > > level, there's about 6 spawn spots inside the maze just past the
>fountains
> > > where you will be off the tracks. I think the regular aviaks (not the
> > > guards) in front of the Arena in Lake Rathe should be ok, though they
>may
> > be
> > > too low. There's also a lizard man camp in Rathe Mountains (one
>outrunner
> > > and 2 in camp). The Southern Ro dervish camps have an outrunner at
>each
> > that
> > > you can go back and forth between or join a group doing one of the
>camps
> > > (the east one is preferable, there's a safe area near the grass where
>you
> > > can pull to and no ghouls or dry bones will wander through). The solo
> > dervs
> > > may spawn a little tough on occasion, but you can kite those using
>fear.
> > > Might be able to do the orc camp in misty thicket, not sure exactly
>how
> > high
> > > they are, but level 10-12 I think. If you can get 4 or 5 people
>together,
> > > the orc camps in Rathe Mountains are great experience and loot.
>There's
> > all
> > > my good spots (good as in loot, experience, and rarely occupied).
> > >
> > > Lozi ~Hand of Chaos~ CT
> > > > Message: 2
> > > > Date: Sun, 19 Dec 1999 18:00:28 -0600
> > > > From: "Richard Slater" <richie@...>
> > > > Subject: Hunting
> > > >
> > > > I am level 12 and looking for some good hunting grounds, I think I'm
> > gunna
> > > > try lavastorm today so I'll see how that goes. But where was
>everyone's
> > > > favorite hunting grounds at level 12?
> > > >
> > > > ~ Skudd of Tarew Marr
> > > >
> > >
> > >
> >
> >
><< text3.html >>
